messages.message:
Happy Monday and here's a PSA for docs workflow (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DOCS/pages/210665492/Docs+workflow). Questions? Ping in <#CM9TARK7U|>.
Plan to integrate technical content changes as part of the development cycle. Don't wait until right before the release.
> *Use Jira* to trigger and track your doc work.
> - For big new features, *Create a Jira* for the doc work in your Jira project. Define scope, audience, technical content. Be sure to fill out the  *Affects versions* fields and provide content in whatever medium is comfortable for you. Link the new Jira to the original Jira.
> - For minor doc updates, select the *Docs > TODO* checkbox in the project Jira. 
> - When doc updates are not required, select the *Docs > Not required* checkbox.
Release notes (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DOCS/pages/185696404/Release+notes) play a vital role in how we inform our users of changes and new features.
I'm here for us all! It's better together.
Inspired by @Jonathan Shih's questions and knowing that so much goodness is happening all the time.
